REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0670 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-DEF 04-01 0041

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET DEFICIT REVISED DOWNWARDS
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it has revised its estimate of today's shortfall to around 1.25 billion stg from 1.3 billion before taking account of 775 mln stg morning assistance. REUTER
